name: World of Warships: Legends — Super-dreadnought
description:
Face your foes with the Grand Old Lady herself — Warspite! Her 15-inch guns have little trouble dealing with other battleships of her tier!

This pack contains: - 3 Premium Days - Warspite Tier V ship - 7 Type 1 camouflage - 7 Hunter camouflage - 37000 Commander XP

Note: this pack comes with 10 Halloween camos as a bonus!

Doubloons will be given as compensation for duplicate Premium ships.
